Package io.servicetalk.data.jackson

Class JacksonSerializationProvider

java.lang.Object
io.servicetalk.data.jackson.JacksonSerializationProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
SerializationProvider
@Deprecated public final class JacksonSerializationProvider extends Object implements SerializationProvider
Deprecated.
Use JacksonSerializerFactory.
SerializationProvider implementation using jackson.
